TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace>
Public Class FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection Inherits Collection(Of FileDialogCustomPlace)

summary.span: 代表 類別的 Windows Vista 自訂位置集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of Windows Vista custom places for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)]，這個類別沒有任何作用。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the . 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 將自訂位置加入至 集合。

span.span: Adds a custom place to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: 將自訂位置加入至 集合。

span.span: Adds a custom place to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將資料夾新增到自訂位置，只會針對特定並不是系統或應用程式的寬度變更。The folder is added to custom places only for a particular and is not a system or application wide change. 資料夾會放置在自訂的順序就會加入至此位置。The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the . 加入的最後一個會在頂端。The last one added will be at the top. 如果您將自訂位置加入不存在於執行應用程式的電腦集合時，將不會顯示自訂位置。If you add a custom place to the collection that does not exist on the computer running the application, the custom place will not be shown. Guid 不區分大小寫。GUIDs are case-insensitive. 取得一份可用[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]已知資料夾，請參閱[檔案對話方塊自訂位置的已知資料夾 Guid](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md)或 KnownFolders.h 檔案中的[!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]。For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]
